articles.description:
Re https://twitter.com/BillHughesDC/status/1688966254944501760

Bill Hughes : wchughes.eth 🦊: The SEC, of course, believes it is the sine qua non of each and every token to promise future profits, whether explicitly or implicitly.  
Any token with a team or even community that works on the protocol is thus a security because the purpose is profit.

落下了很多亏钱机会

olimpio: There's a risk of a black swan event in DeFi.
As per Defillama, if CRV drops below $0.37, there's 300M CRV to liquidate in Aave -most from Curve's founder
The problem? There's not a single Exchange or DeFi protocol where one can sell such a large CRV amount.
Risks explained 🧵

7. 预测市场（创建具有真实流动性的市场）

When I say normalizing, I mean post GFC - we are light years from pre-GFC levels.
